short_description: dindomani is an accounting & bookkeeping services company based in carlos barbosa, brazil.
long_description: a certeza de sua empresa em boas mãos. eficiente para guiar suas decisões organização de documentos, balancetes periódicos e relatórios gerenciais. gestão eficiente dos ativos da sua empresa, garantindo controle, valorização e depreciação precisa do patrimônio. venha fazer parte você também.
generated_description: dindomani is a company based in rio grande do sul, specializing in accounting and business consultancy services. the company offers a range of services including the preparation of periodic financial statements, management reports, and balance sheet analysis. dindomani also provides legal services such as company incorporation, alteration, and dissolution, as well as negative certificates and procurement processes. additionally, the company manages payroll, including employment contracts, resignations, and social security obligations, and assists with esocial and gps and fgts filings. dindomani also handles fiscal accounting, including the issuance of fiscal books, tax calculations, and tax optimization. the company also provides personal income tax services, including tax declarations, tax refunds, and capital gains calculations.
